artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Poem by Iwama Otsuni; Published by Nishimuraya Yohachi
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
marks: Bara no hana / chiri nu ru ori ka / oka no ie, Ots Saki no Hokusai Iitsu hitsu 前北斎為一筆
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Warbler and Roses
